_meta.notes: Effect registry for qbCoach deterministic engine (constant-delta aura effects).

003_on_play_enemy_affected_tiles_minus4.description: When played, lower the power of enemy cards on affected tiles by 4.

006_on_play_all_affected_tiles_minus3.description: When played, lower the power of allied and enemy cards on affected tiles by 3.

020_on_play_enemy_affected_tiles_minus3.description: When played, lower the power of enemy cards on affected tiles by 3.

022_on_play_all_affected_tiles_minus3.description: When played, lower the power of allied and enemy cards on affected tiles by 3.

027_while_in_play_all_affected_tiles_min.description: Lower the power of allied and enemy cards on affected tiles by 1 while this card is in play.

037_on_destroy_all_affected_tiles_minus4.description: When destroyed, lower the power of allied and enemy cards on affected tiles by 4.
